original_title: Welcome to Paradiso (City in the Sea)
overview: Paradiso, the release from Chino Amobi, was one of 2017's biggest sounds in electronic music. Artist Rick Farin took the helm to create this immersive, and satisfyingly odd, 3D animated video to accompany Amobi's musicâ€”detailing a city called Paradiso, and the beautiful humanoid inhabitants who call it home.
title: Welcome to Paradiso (City in the Sea)
